ActInputValue.Value: select PURO_OID from (select PURO_OID from inv_purchase_ordln order by sys_creation_date desc) where rownum=1
update rmsppcxcr set MANUFACTURER_ID='00001481',MANF_LOC_ID='40000001', MANF_OID='{Var Name=PO_ID}' where JOB_REC='RMSPPCXCR'
cat {Var Name=Log_name}| grep 'The path of the PPC' | xargs echo c=
cat {Var Name=Log_name}| grep 'The name of the' | xargs echo c=

VariableString.InitialStringValue: c= The path of the PPC file is : /users/vdwrk727/var/puc/projs/rms/interfaces/output/Jul/10/
VariableString.Name: PPC_FILE_PATH

VariableString.InitialStringValue: c= The name of the PPC file is : rms.RMSPPCXCR20_reg.20230710_053057.output The name of the PPC file is : rms.RMSPPCXCR20_reg.20230710_053057.output
VariableString.Name: PPC_Fle_name

ActInputValue.Value: update ac_processing_accounting set FILE_NAME='{Var Name=FINAL_INPUT_FILE}' , FILE_PATH='{Var Name=Final_PPC_File_path}' ,FILE_STATUS='RD' where identifier = '112' and file_name like '%RMS%'
select FILE_STATUS from ac_processing_accounting where identifier = '112'

ActDBValidation.Description: DataBase - FIND the status of cards_Copy

ActInputValue.Value: select serial_number from (select serial_number from serial_item_inv where trunc(sys_creation_date) = trunc(sysdate) order by imsi) where rownum=1

ActDBValidation.Description: DataBase - FIND the status of cards

ActInputValue.Value: select sim_status from serial_item_inv where serial_number='{Var Name=FIRST_SIM}'
update serial_item_inv set transport_key_nr='96' where trunc(sys_creation_date) = trunc(sysdate-1)
update serial_item_inv set IMSI=substr(IMSI,1,3)|| '09' || substr(IMSI,6,15) where trunc(sys_creation_date) = trunc(sysdate)

VariableString.InitialStringValue: update serial_item_inv set pin1='1234' where IMSI= '262020451005735' update serial_item_inv set puk2='199919' where IMSI= '262020451005735' update serial_item_inv set ki='SAVVINA1234567890' where IMSI= '262020451005735'
VariableString.Name: UPDATES
